div.div: Emergency School Closing Extended Through May 15, 2020. Governor Cuomo announced that the statewide emergency school closure is extended through May 15, 2020.

Virtual Board of Education Meeting - April 27, 2020 @ 7pm Please click the link below to join the meeting:
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84439700146?pwd=NS8vUCt3WVp1QkZXQmdZWmdqRDdvdz09
Password: 6LNvfP
Or Telephone:
+1 929 436 2866

Password: 700315
Please submit any questions or comments to the District Clerk via email (jiannone@whbschools.org) by Monday, April 27th @ 10am.
